name: Guardian Archaeopteryx
movement: walking speed of 15 feet and flying speed of 50 feet
description: The Guardian Archaeopteryx is a small, agile dinosaur with natural armor that aids in its defense. It features a beak and sharp talons for melee combat, and its colorful feathers help it blend into its surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to fly without provoking opportunity attacks makes it a challenging opponent in combat.
goals: To assist its allies in combat while evading physical attacks.
relations: Could be accompanied by other small beasts or serve as a companion to spellcasters.
environment: Found in areas with plenty of open space for flight, such as forests or grasslands.
strengths: Good agility and magical resistance enhance its survivability, while its ability to support allies with poison imbues increases combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Low strength and intelligence limit its physical attack capabilities and intelligence-based tasks.
attacks: Can use a combination of beak and talons for melee attacks, or unleash a ranged spit thorn attack.
most_powerful_ability: Imbue Poison ability supports allies, enhancing their attacks with additional poison effects.
senses: Has a passive perception of 14, making it fairly observant.
skills: Has a perception skill with a +2 modifier, allowing it to notice threats or opportunities.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Multiattack feature allows for versatile combat strategies.
test_queries: small beast that supports allies with poison
